object_name.value: Validate selected document has Controlled Print or Export requests are available.

title.value: This condition verifies if the selected document has Controlled Print or Export requests are available.

repeating.value: OpenText Life Sciences Medical Device for Quality and Manufacturing Solution
OpenText Life Sciences Quality and Manufacturing Solution
The document - "$value(object_name)" does not have controlled print or export requests available.
dm_dbo.single_result_row_view where not exists (select * from dm_audittrail where event_name in ('c2_controled_print','d2_export') and audited_obj_id='$value(r_object_id)')
